( #{projectInfo.dataId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectInfo.nd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectInfo.ktid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectInfo.ktmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectInfo.jfhj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectInfo.sjhf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectInfo.xdjf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectInfo.createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{projectInfo.createPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectInfo.status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectInfo.updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{projectInfo.define1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectInfo.define2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectInfo.define3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectInfo.define4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectInfo.define5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectInfo.define6,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

select out_project_info.*, group_concat(out_project_erp.erp_project_code) as epc from out_project_info left join out_project_erp on (out_project_info.data_id = out_project_erp.opi_id) where (out_project_info.project_type = '0' or out_project_info.project_type = '2')
and out_project_info.nd = #{nd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and out_project_info.hth like '%${hth}%'
and out_project_info.xmmc like '%${xmmc}%'
and out_project_info.define1 like '%${define1}%'
and out_project_info.define2 like '%${define2}%'
and out_project_info.project_property like '%${projectProperty}%'
and out_project_info.project_scope like '%${projectScope}%'
and out_project_info.type_flag like '%${typeFlag}%'
and out_project_info.zylb like '%${zylb}%'
and out_project_info.zycmc like '%${zycmc}%'
and out_project_info.status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
group by out_project_info.data_id

select count(DISTINCT xmid) as projectCount from out_project_info where project_property not like '%%' and out_project_info.nd = '${nd}' and out_project_info.ysnd = '${nd}' and (project_type = '0' or project_type = '2') and out_project_info.project_property not like '%%'
and define2 like '%${define2}%'
and type_flag like '%${typeFlag}%'

select round(sum(out_project_info.ysje),4) as projectMoney from out_project_info where project_property not like '%%' and out_project_info.ysnd = '${nd}' and (project_type = '0' or project_type = '2') and out_project_info.project_property not like '%%'
and define2 like '%${define2}%'
and type_flag like '%${typeFlag}%'

select sum(case when xmlbbm != 'KYZB' then 1 else 0 end) as projectCount, sum(case when xmlbbm = 'KYZB' then 1 else 0 end) as kyzbCount from out_project_info where project_property not like '%%' and out_project_info.ysnd = '${nd}' and (project_type = '0' or project_type = '2') and out_project_info.project_property not like '%%'
and type_flag like '%${typeFlag}%'
select sum(case nd when '${nd}' then 1 else 0 end) as newProject, count(*) as totalProject,fzdw from out_project_info where project_type != '1' group by fzdw

select sum(case project_scope when '' then 1 else 0 end) as xksl, sum(case project_scope when '' then 1 else 0 end) as xjsl, sum(case project_scope when '' then 1 else 0 end) as wjsl, SUBSTR(type_flag FROM 2) type_flag from out_project_info where type_flag is not null and project_type != '1' and xmlbbm != 'KYZB' group BY type_flag

select sum(case project_scope when '' then 1 else 0 end) as xksl, sum(case project_scope when '' then 1 else 0 end) as xjsl, sum(case project_scope when '' then 1 else 0 end) as wjsl, SUBSTR(type_flag FROM 2) type_flag from out_project_info where type_flag is not null and project_type != '1' and xmlbbm = 'KYZB' group BY type_flag

select sum(case when project_property ='' and project_scope = '' then 1 else 0 end) as gjxmsl, sum(case when project_property ='' and project_scope = '' then 1 else 0 end) as zdzzsl, sum(case when project_property ='' and project_scope = '' then 1 else 0 end) as zdxmsl, sum(case when project_property ='' and project_scope = '' then 1 else 0 end) as qtsl, count(*) as zsl from out_project_info where project_type != '1' and (project_scope = '' or project_scope = '')
and define2 is not null and define2 like '%${define2}%'
and type_flag like '%${typeFlag}%'

select sum(case when project_property ='' and project_scope = '' then 1 else 0 end) as xkgjsl, sum(case when project_property ='' and nd = '2017' then 1 else 0 end) as qngjsl, sum(case when project_property ='' and project_scope = '' then 1 else 0 end) as xkzzsl, sum(case when project_property ='' and nd = '2017' then 1 else 0 end) as qnzzsl, sum(case when project_property ='' and project_scope = '' then 1 else 0 end) as xkzdsl, sum(case when project_property ='' and nd = '2017' then 1 else 0 end) as qnzdsl, sum(case when LEFT(hth,3) ='CLY' and project_scope = '' then 1 else 0 end) as lysybsl, sum(case when LEFT(hth,3) ='CLY' and nd = '2017' then 1 else 0 end) as qnlysybsl, sum(case when LEFT(hth,3) ='CHG' and project_scope = '' then 1 else 0 end) as hgsybsl, sum(case when LEFT(hth,3) ='CHG' and nd = '2017' then 1 else 0 end) as qnhgsybsl from out_project_info where project_type != '1'

select sum(case when project_scope = '' then 1 else 0 end) as xksl, sum(case when project_scope = '' then 1 else 0 end) as xjsl, count(*) as zsl,define4 as zycmc from out_project_info where (project_type = '0' or project_type = '2') and xmlbbm != 'KYZB' and (project_scope = '' or project_scope = '') and define4 is not null group by define4

select sum(case when project_property = '' then 1 else 0 end) as gjxmsl, sum(case when project_property = '' then 1 else 0 end) as zdzxxmsl, sum(case when project_property = '' then 1 else 0 end) as zdxmsl, sum(case when project_property = '' then 1 else 0 end) as qtsl, sum(case when define2 = '101' then 1 else 0 end) as ktysl, sum(case when define2 = '102' then 1 else 0 end) as wtysl, sum(case when define2 = '103' then 1 else 0 end) as gcysl, sum(case when define2 = '104' then 1 else 0 end) as skysl, sum(case when define2 = '105' then 1 else 0 end) as dlysl, sum(case when define2 = '106' then 1 else 0 end) as bhysl, sum(case when define2 = '107' then 1 else 0 end) as shysl, sum(case when define2 = '108' then 1 else 0 end) as agysl,
count(*) as zsl,project_scope from out_project_info where project_type != '1' and (project_scope = '' or project_scope = '') and xmlbbm != 'KYZB' group by project_scope

select sum(case when project_scope = '' then 1 else 0 end) as xksl, sum(case when project_scope = '' then 1 else 0 end) as xjsl, count(*) as zsl, SUBSTR(define2 FROM 4) define2 from out_project_info where project_type != '1' and (project_scope = '' or project_scope = '') and define2 is not null and xmlbbm !='KYZB' and type_flag like '%%' group by define2

select sum(case when project_scope = '' then 1 else 0 end) as xksl, sum(case when project_scope = '' then 1 else 0 end) as xjsl, count(*) as zsl, SUBSTR(define2 FROM 4) define2 from out_project_info where project_type != '1' and (project_scope = '' or project_scope = '') and define2 is not null and xmlbbm ='KYZB' and type_flag like '%%' group by define2

select sum(case when project_scope = '' then 1 else 0 end) as xksl, sum(case when project_scope = '' then 1 else 0 end) as xjsl, count(*) as zsl,zylb from out_project_info where project_type != '1' and zylb is not null and xmlbbm = 'KYZB' group by zylb

select sum(case when project_property = '' then 1 else 0 end) as gjxmsl, sum(case when project_property = '' then 1 else 0 end) as zdzxxmsl, sum(case when project_property = '' then 1 else 0 end) as zdxmsl, sum(case when project_property = '' then 1 else 0 end) as qtsl, sum(case when define2 = '101' then 1 else 0 end) as ktysl, sum(case when define2 = '102' then 1 else 0 end) as wtysl, sum(case when define2 = '103' then 1 else 0 end) as gcysl, sum(case when define2 = '104' then 1 else 0 end) as skysl, sum(case when define2 = '105' then 1 else 0 end) as dlysl, sum(case when define2 = '106' then 1 else 0 end) as bhysl, sum(case when define2 = '107' then 1 else 0 end) as shysl, sum(case when define2 = '108' then 1 else 0 end) as agysl, count(*) as zsl,project_scope from out_project_info where project_type != '1' and (project_scope = '' or project_scope = '') and xmlbbm = 'KYZB' group by project_scope

select round(sum(case when project_scope = '' then jf else 0 end)/10000,4) as xkje, round(sum(case when project_scope = '' then jf else 0 end)/10000,4) as xjje, round(sum(jf)/10000,4) as zje, define1 from out_project_info where (project_type = '0' or project_type = '2') and (project_scope = '' or project_scope = '') group by define1

SELECT type_flag, TRUNCATE(zje/10000,2) AS zje, TRUNCATE(fyxje/10000,2) AS fyxje, TRUNCATE( zbxje/10000,2) AS zbxje, TRUNCATE(prezje/10000,2) AS prezje, TRUNCATE(prefyxje/10000,2) AS prefyxje, TRUNCATE(prezbxje/10000,2) AS prezbxje, TRUNCATE((prezje-zje)/10000,2)AS wxd, CASE WHEN TRUNCATE( zje/ prezje ,2) IS NULL OR TRUNCATE( zje/ prezje ,2)=0 THEN '0' ELSE TRUNCATE( (zje/ prezje)*100 ,2) END AS ztzwcl , CASE WHEN TRUNCATE( fyxje/prefyxje ,2) IS NULL OR TRUNCATE( fyxje/prefyxje ,2)=0 THEN '0' ELSE TRUNCATE( fyxje/prefyxje*100 ,2) END AS fyxtzwcl , CASE WHEN TRUNCATE( zbxje / prezbxje ,2) IS NULL OR TRUNCATE( zbxje / prezbxje ,2)=0 THEN '0' ELSE TRUNCATE( zbxje / prezbxje*100 ,2) END AS zbxtzwcl, CASE WHEN type_flag LIKE '' THEN 1 WHEN type_flag LIKE '' THEN 2 WHEN type_flag LIKE '' THEN 3 WHEN type_flag LIKE '' THEN 4 WHEN type_flag LIKE '' THEN 5 WHEN type_flag LIKE '' THEN 6 WHEN type_flag LIKE '' THEN 7 WHEN type_flag LIKE '' THEN 8 WHEN type_flag LIKE '' THEN 9 WHEN type_flag LIKE '' THEN 10 END AS orders FROM ( SELECT SUBSTR(temName FROM 2) type_flag,ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN showFlag = 'act' THEN fyxje ELSE 0 END),4) AS fyxje, ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN showFlag = 'act' THEN zbxje ELSE 0 END),4) AS zbxje, ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN showFlag = 'act' THEN zje ELSE 0 END),4) AS zje, ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN showFlag = 'pre' THEN fyxje ELSE 0 END),4) AS prefyxje, ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN showFlag = 'pre' THEN zbxje ELSE 0 END),4) AS prezbxje, ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN showFlag = 'pre' THEN zje ELSE 0 END),4) AS prezje
FROM ( SELECT ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN define1 = '' THEN jf ELSE 0 END),4) AS fyxje, ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN define1 = '' THEN jf ELSE 0 END),4) AS zbxje, ROUND(SUM(jf),4) AS zje, type_flag,'act' AS showFlag, type_flag AS temName FROM out_project_info WHERE project_type != '1' AND project_scope = '' AND type_flag IS NOT NULL GROUP BY type_flag UNION ALL
SELECT fyx_money,zbx_money,fyx_money+zbx_money AS zje,show_ali,'pre' AS showFlag, CASE WHEN show_ali = '' THEN '1' WHEN show_ali = '' THEN '2' WHEN show_ali = '' THEN '3' WHEN show_ali = '' THEN '4' WHEN show_ali = '' THEN '9' WHEN show_ali = '' THEN '5' WHEN show_ali = '' THEN '6' WHEN show_ali = '' THEN '7' WHEN show_ali = '' THEN '8' ELSE show_ali END AS temName FROM out_tem_money_total WHERE money_level = '2' ) AS tableB GROUP BY temName
UNION ALL SELECT type_flag, SUM(fyxje) AS fyxje, SUM( zbxje) AS zbxje, SUM(zje )AS zje, SUM(prefyxje) AS prefyxje, SUM(prezbxje) AS prezbxje, SUM(prezje) AS prezje
FROM ( SELECT '' type_flag, ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN showFlag = 'act' THEN fyxje ELSE 0 END),4) AS fyxje, ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN showFlag = 'act' THEN zbxje ELSE 0 END),4) AS zbxje, ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN showFlag = 'act' THEN zje ELSE 0 END),4) AS zje, ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN showFlag = 'pre' THEN fyxje ELSE 0 END),4) AS prefyxje, ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN showFlag = 'pre' THEN zbxje ELSE 0 END),4) AS prezbxje, ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN showFlag = 'pre' THEN zje ELSE 0 END),4) AS prezje, ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN showFlag = 'act' THEN zje ELSE 0 END)/SUM(CASE WHEN showFlag = 'pre' THEN zje ELSE 0 END),4) AS ztzwcl, ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN showFlag = 'act' THEN fyxje ELSE 0 END)/SUM(CASE WHEN showFlag = 'pre' THEN fyxje ELSE 0 END),4) AS fyxtzwcl, ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN showFlag = 'act' THEN zbxje ELSE 0 END)/SUM(CASE WHEN showFlag = 'pre' THEN zbxje ELSE 0 END),4) AS zbxtzwcl FROM ( SELECT ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN define1 = '' THEN jf ELSE 0 END),4) AS fyxje, ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN define1 = '' THEN jf ELSE 0 END),4) AS zbxje, ROUND(SUM(jf),4) AS zje, type_flag,'act' AS showFlag, type_flag AS temName FROM out_project_info WHERE project_type != '1' AND project_scope = '' AND type_flag IS NOT NULL GROUP BY type_flag UNION ALL
SELECT fyx_money,zbx_money,fyx_money+zbx_money AS zje,show_ali,'pre' AS showFlag, CASE WHEN show_ali = '' THEN '1' WHEN show_ali = '' THEN '2' WHEN show_ali = '' THEN '3' WHEN show_ali = '' THEN '4' WHEN show_ali = '' THEN '9' WHEN show_ali = '' THEN '5' WHEN show_ali = '' THEN '6' WHEN show_ali = '' THEN '7' WHEN show_ali = '' THEN '8' ELSE show_ali END AS temName FROM out_tem_money_total WHERE money_level = '2' ) AS tableB GROUP BY temName )asda
)abc ORDER BY orders

select round(sum(case when define1 = '' then jf else 0 end),4) as fyxje, round(sum(case when define1 = '' then jf else 0 end),4) as zbxje, round(sum(jf), 2) as zje, sum(case when define1 = '' then 1 else 0 end) as fyxsl, sum(case when define1 = '' then 1 else 0 end) as zbxsl, count(*) as zsl, round(sum(case when define1 = '' then 1 else 0 end)/count(*)*100, 2) as fyxRate, round(sum(case when define1 = '' then 1 else 0 end)/count(*)*100, 2) as zbxRate, SUBSTR(define2 FROM 4) define2 from out_project_info where project_type != '1' and project_property not like '%%' and out_project_info.ysnd = '${nd}' and type_flag like '%%' and out_project_info.project_property not like '%%' group by define2

select sum(case when project_property = '' and nd = '${nd}' then 1 else 0 end) as gjxksl, sum(case when project_property = '' and nd != '${nd}' then 1 else 0 end) as gjjzsl, sum(case when project_property = '' then 1 else 0 end) as gjsl, SUBSTR(define2 FROM 4) define2 from out_project_info where project_type != '1' and project_property not like '%%' and out_project_info.ysnd = '${nd}' and type_flag like '%%' group by define2

select count(*) as zsl,UUID() as id, SUBSTR(type_flag FROM 2) type_flag,project_scope from out_project_info where project_type != '1' and (project_scope = '' or project_scope = '') and type_flag is not null and xmlbbm !='KYZB' group by type_flag,project_scope

select count(*) as zsl,UUID() as id, define4 as zycmc,project_scope from out_project_info where project_type != '1' and (project_scope = '' or project_scope = '') and define4 is not null and xmlbbm !='KYZB' group by define4,project_scope

select count(*) as zsl,UUID() as id, SUBSTR(type_flag FROM 2) type_flag,project_scope from out_project_info where project_type != '1' and (project_scope = '' or project_scope = '') and type_flag is not null and xmlbbm ='KYZB' group by type_flag,project_scope

select count(*) as zsl,UUID() as id,project_scope,SUBSTR(define2 FROM 4) define2 from out_project_info where project_type != '1' and (project_scope = '' or project_scope = '') and xmlbbm ='KYZB' and define2 is not null and type_flag like '%%' group by project_scope,define2
select round(sum(jf)/10000,4) as zje,UUID() as id,define1,project_scope from out_project_info where project_type != '1' and (project_scope = '' or project_scope = '') group by define1,project_scope

select round(sum(jf)/10000,4) as zje,UUID() as id, define1,SUBSTR(type_flag FROM 2) type_flag from out_project_info where project_type != '1' and (project_scope = '' or project_scope = '') and type_flag is not null group by define1,type_flag

select project_property,count(*) as xmsl FROM out_project_info where project_type != '1' and (project_scope = '' or project_scope = '') and (project_property = '' or project_property = '' or project_property = '' or project_property = '') group by project_property

select count(*) as zsl,UUID() as id, SUBSTR(type_flag FROM 2) type_flag,project_scope from out_project_info where project_type != '1' and (project_scope = '' or project_scope = '') and type_flag is not null and xmlbbm !='KYZB' group by type_flag,project_scope

select sum(case project_scope when '' then 1 else 0 end) as xksl, sum(case project_scope when '' then 1 else 0 end) as xjsl, SUBSTR(type_flag FROM 2) type_flag from out_project_info where type_flag is not null and project_type != '1' and (project_scope = '' or project_scope = '') group BY type_flag

select sum(case when project_scope = '' then 1 else 0 end) as xksl, sum(case when project_scope = '' then 1 else 0 end) as xjsl, count(*) as zsl,define4 as zycmc from out_project_info where (project_type = '0' or project_type = '2') and (project_scope = '' or project_scope = '') and define4 is not null group by define4

select sum(case when project_property = '' then 1 else 0 end) as gjxmsl, sum(case when project_property = '' then 1 else 0 end) as zdzxxmsl, sum(case when project_property = '' then 1 else 0 end) as zdxmsl, sum(case when project_property = '' then 1 else 0 end) as qtsl, sum(case when project_property = '' then 1 else 0 end) as stlxmsl, sum(case when define2 = '101' then 1 else 0 end) as ktysl, sum(case when define2 = '102' then 1 else 0 end) as wtysl, sum(case when define2 = '103' then 1 else 0 end) as gcysl, sum(case when define2 = '104' then 1 else 0 end) as skysl, sum(case when define2 = '105' then 1 else 0 end) as dlysl, sum(case when define2 = '106' then 1 else 0 end) as bhysl, sum(case when define2 = '107' then 1 else 0 end) as shysl, sum(case when define2 = '108' then 1 else 0 end) as agysl,
count(*) as zsl,project_scope from out_project_info where project_type != '1' and (project_scope = '' or project_scope = '') group by project_scope

select sum(case when nd = '${nd}' then 1 else 0 end) as xksl, sum(case when nd != '${nd}' then 1 else 0 end) as xjsl, count(xmid) as zsl, round(count(DISTINCT xmid)/(select count(*) from out_project_info where project_type != '1' and project_property not like '%%' and out_project_info.ysnd = '${nd}' and type_flag like '%%'and out_project_info.project_property not like '%%'
and xmlbbm ='KYZB'
and xmlbbm !='KYZB'
)*100,4) zslRate, round(sum(case when nd = '2018' then 1 else 0 end)/(select count(*) from out_project_info where project_type != '1' and project_property not like '%%' and out_project_info.ysnd = '${nd}' and type_flag like '%%' and out_project_info.project_property not like '%%'
and xmlbbm ='KYZB'
and xmlbbm !='KYZB'
)*100,4) xkRate, round(sum(case when nd != '2018' then 1 else 0 end)/(select count(*) from out_project_info where project_type != '1' and project_property not like '%%' and out_project_info.ysnd = '${nd}' and type_flag like '%%' and out_project_info.project_property not like '%%'
and xmlbbm ='KYZB'
and xmlbbm !='KYZB'
)*100,4) xjRate, SUBSTR(define2 FROM 4) define2 from out_project_info where project_type != '1' and project_property not like '%%' and out_project_info.ysnd = '${nd}' and type_flag like '%%' and out_project_info.project_property not like '%%'
and xmlbbm ='KYZB'
and xmlbbm !='KYZB'
group by define2
SELECT show_ali as unitName,zbx_money as zbxje,fyx_money as fyxje FROM out_tem_money_total WHERE is_yjy = '' ORDER BY show_order

SELECT show_ali as unitName,fyx_money as showJE,UUID() as id,'' as typeName FROM out_tem_money_total WHERE money_level = '2' and fyx_money !=''
union all SELECT show_ali as unitName,zbx_money as showJE,UUID() as id,'' as typeName FROM out_tem_money_total WHERE money_level = '2' and zbx_money !=''
SELECT show_ali as unitName,zbx_money as zbxje,fyx_money as fyxje FROM out_tem_money_total WHERE money_level = '2'
SELECT unit_name as unitName,sum(xk_money) as xkje,sum(jz_money) as jzje FROM out_tem_money group by unit_name

SELECT unit_name as unitName,sum(xk_money) as showJE,'' as typeName, UUID() as id FROM out_tem_money group by unit_name
union all SELECT unit_name as unitName,sum(jz_money) as showJE,'' as typeName, UUID() as id FROM out_tem_money group by unit_name

select sum(case when showFlag = 'preMoney' then zbxje else 0 end) as prezbxje, sum(case when showFlag = 'preMoney' then fyxje else 0 end) as prefyxje, sum(case when showFlag = 'preMoney' then zje else 0 end) as prezje, sum(case when showFlag = 'actMoney' then zbxje else 0 end) as actzbxje, sum(case when showFlag = 'actMoney' then fyxje else 0 end) as actfyxje, sum(case when showFlag = 'actMoney' then zje else 0 end) as actzje, round(sum(case when showFlag = 'actMoney' then fyxje else 0 end)/sum(case when showFlag = 'preMoney' then fyxje else 0 end) * 100, 2) as fyxrate, round(sum(case when showFlag = 'actMoney' then zbxje else 0 end)/sum(case when showFlag = 'preMoney' then zbxje else 0 end) * 100, 2) as zbxrate, round(sum(case when showFlag = 'actMoney' then zje else 0 end)/sum(case when showFlag = 'preMoney' then zje else 0 end) * 100, 2) as zrate, unitName from ( SELECT show_ali as unitName,zbx_money as zbxje,fyx_money as fyxje,zbx_money+fyx_money as zje,'preMoney' as showFlag,show_order FROM out_tem_money_total WHERE is_yjy = ''
union ALL SELECT SUBSTR(define2 FROM 4) as unitName,ROUND(sum(case when define1 = '' then jf else 0 end),2) as zbxje, ROUND(sum(case when define1 = '' then jf else 0 end),2) as fyxje, ROUND(sum(jf),2) as zje, 'actMoney' as showFlag,SUBSTR(define2,3,1) as show_order FROM out_project_info WHERE define2 is not NULL and nd = '2018' and (project_scope = '' or project_scope = '') and type_flag like '%%' group by define2) as tableA GROUP BY unitName, show_order ORDER BY show_order
select nd,ysnd,hth,xmmc,jf,ysje,fzdw,zylb,fzrxm,zycmc,xmlbmc,define1,fwdx from out_project_info where project_property = '' and ysnd = '${nd}' order by nd desc,hth

select sum(case when project_property = '' and project_type != '2' then 1 else 0 end) as zdzxsl, sum(case when project_property = '' and project_type != '2' then 1 else 0 end) as stlsl, count(*) as zsl, SUBSTR(define2 FROM 4) define2 from out_project_info where define2 is not null and (project_scope = '' or project_scope = '') and type_flag like '%%' group by define2

select sum(case when nd = '${nd}' then 1 else 0 end) as xksl, sum(case when nd != '${nd}' then 1 else 0 end) as xjsl, count(*) as zsl, (select count(*) from out_project_info where project_type != '1' and project_property not like '%%' and out_project_info.ysnd = '${nd}' and define7 not like '%%' and type_flag like '%%' and out_project_info.project_property not like '%%') as temsh, round(count(*)/(select count(*) from out_project_info where project_type != '1' and project_property not like '%%' and out_project_info.ysnd = '${nd}' and type_flag like '%%' and out_project_info.project_property not like '%%'
and xmlbbm ='KYZB'
and xmlbbm !='KYZB'
)*100, 2) as zslRate, round(sum(case when nd = '${nd}' then 1 else 0 end)/count(*)*100, 2) as xkRate, round(sum(case when nd != '${nd}' then 1 else 0 end)/count(*)*100, 2) as xjRate, project_property FROM out_project_info where project_type != '1' and project_property not like '%%' and out_project_info.ysnd = '${nd}' and type_flag like '%%' and out_project_info.project_property not like '%%'
and xmlbbm ='KYZB'
and xmlbbm !='KYZB'
group by project_property

SELECT SUBSTR(define5 FROM 4) define5,SUM(zsl) zsl,SUM(xksl) xksl,SUM(xjsl) xjsl FROM ( select case when define5 is null then '109' else define5 end as define5, count(*) as zsl, sum(case when nd = '${nd}' then 1 else 0 end) as xksl, sum(case when nd != '${nd}' then 1 else 0 end) as xjsl from out_project_info WHERE ysnd= '${nd}' and project_type != '1' and project_property not like '%%' and out_project_info.project_property not like '%%'
and type_flag like '%${typeFlag}%'
and xmlbbm ='KYZB'
and xmlbbm !='KYZB'
group by define5) AS tableA GROUP BY tableA.define5
select xmlbmc,count(DISTINCT xmmc) as sl from out_project_info WHERE project_property = '' and nd='${nd}' and project_type != '2' group by xmlbmc

select sum(case when ysnd='${nd}' and `status` = '' then 1 else 0 end) sqxm, sum(case when ysnd='${nd}' and `status` = '' then 1 else 0 end) sqtl, sum(case when ysnd='${nd}' and `status` = '' then 1 else 0 end) tjrl, sum(case when ysnd='${nd}' and `status` = '' then 1 else 0 end) sqyq, sum(case when ysnd='${nd}' and `status` = '' then 1 else 0 end) sqcl, sum(case when ysnd='${nd}' and `status` = '' then 1 else 0 end) zyxm from ( select distinct xmmc,ysnd,`status` from out_project_info WHERE project_property = '' and project_type != '2' ) as tableA

select SUBSTR(define2 FROM 4) as define2, sum(case when project_property = '' then 1 else 0 end) stlxm, sum(case when project_property = '' then 1 else 0 end) zdzx FROM (select distinct xmmc,ysnd,project_property,define2 from out_project_info WHERE ysnd = '${nd}' and type_flag like '%' and project_type != '2' ) as tableA GROUP BY tableA.define2
